text.value: You cannot select 'Was not accompanied' if you have selected another option!
Date cannot be in the future!
On the way to the health facility
_Refer the mother and baby to health facility immediately_
Did go to the waiting home?
Did go to the health facility after delivery
Please enter the correct value which must be equal to 1, 2, 3, or 4!
How many babies did deliver during this delivery?
Please enter the correct number of babies born alive during this delivery!
How many babies are still alive?
Tasks will appear when follow up is needed.
_Be sure you submit to complete this action._
_Remind the mother to enroll the child to EID programme._
Person to visit health facility alone
Did you refer for EID enrollment
Please add the details of newborns who are live births.
_Tumizani mayi ndi mwana wake kuchipatala mwansanga_
Chonde sankhani nambala yolondola yomwe ili yolingana ndi 1,2,3 kapena 4
Chonde lowetsani nambala yolondola ya ana amoyo omwe angobadwa kumene
Ndi ana angati amene ali moyo?
Ntchito iyi idzawoneka ku gawo la Zochita pa…..
_Nambala ya ana amene abadwa amoyo: _
_Wonetsetsani kuti mwatumiza tsambali kuti mumalize ntchito iyi._
_Kumbutsani mayi zomulembetsa mwana mu pologalamu ya EID_.
Chonde lembani dzina/maina a ana amene ali moyo
